channel.title: Server issue
channel.description:
Hey,
So i am hosting my server, but some players can't access it!.. They have white screen or stuff like so.
I have made my own webclient on my website and some can access it.. I've also made a webclient on "rswebclients" and put a loader that they suggest. So, the loeader use his own cache. And somehow, they can access my webclient than...
I've re-uploaded the client & the cache many times and compiled it with different java versions but same problem...
If anyone can help me, would be nice..

item.title: Server issue
item.dc:creator: @kawfan kawfan
item.description:
@kawfan wrote:

Hey,

So i am hosting my server, but some players can’t access it!..
They have white screen or stuff like so.

I have made my own webclient on my website and some can access it…
I’ve also made a webclient on “rswebclients” and put a loader that they suggest. So, the loeader use his own cache.
And somehow, they can access my webclient than…

I’ve re-uploaded the client & the cache many times and compiled it with different java versions but same problem…

If anyone can help me, would be nice…
